properties.address: Horncastle Library, Wharf Road, Horncastle LN9 5HL
properties.description: It is free to join and use the library and everyone is welcome. Alongside free access to books, computers, casual and study seating, the Library runs a host of free activities for adults and children
properties.title: Horncastle Library

properties.description: Open from 16/10/2022. Our Warm Welcome sessions are every Wednesday afternoon between 3 to 5pm. Outside the sessions we run a coffee shop which is open onMonday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Friday 9:30 to 14:00 . When the coffee shop is open we sell hot drinks and snacks.
properties.title: The Open Door and Bardney Christian Community Trust

properties.address: Woodhall Spa Library, Station Road, Woodhall Spa LN10 6QL
properties.description: It is free to join and use the library and everyone is welcome. Alongside free access to books, computers, casual and study seating, the Library runs a host of free activities for adults and children including Connect Over A Cuppa community coffee morning every Thursday 10.30-11.30, there is no charge for refreshments.
properties.title: Woodhall Spa Library
